data.text: @QuarteringGaffs Credit where credits due, his "Wife" has had numerous highly successful careers that seem to alternate every few months
@QuarteringGaffs How could something like this happen to him? He took not a single precaution!

@QuarteringGaffs the “only 11 people got it in 2020 worldwide” thing is so funny to me because i personally know 3 people (including myself) who got the flu in 2020. which apparently means i know a quarter of all people on earth who got the flu in 2020
@QuarteringGaffs Manz is documenting his death by preventable viruses on Twitter
@QuarteringGaffs Also, don't forget he's over 400 pounds and an alcoholic.
@IM_Ramble @QuarteringGaffs Anything to get out of the house
@QuarteringGaffs How many careers does his "wife" have now? From pilot to pharmaceutical tech? Wasn't she a professional chef at some point?
@QuarteringGaffs I wonder if he is actually vaccinated and just says to not get it because that’s what his audience wants him to say as he’s a grifter.

@QuarteringGaffs "I'm going to live forever"

Not if you keep catching avoidable illnesses, you won't.
